Title: Relates to allowing a physically disabled surviving spouse who was married to an enhanced STAR qualifying individual to continue to receive the exemption
Summary: Relates to allowing a physically disabled surviving spouse who was married to an enhanced STAR qualifying individual to continue to receive the exemption even if the surviving spouse is not sixty-two years of age.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to extending the enhanced STAR exemption to the disabled surviving spouse of a previously qualifying individual
